comment.body: Especially the 'disposable' goyim are fair game. But, to keep some balance, it appears to me that all so called holy books have similar passages that encourage devotees to turn into satanic monsters. Oh, maybe that is because all organised religions stem from Babylon?

Cartoon modified by Paolo Stefano Fratianni. His original may be found at:

https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10159365154450398&set=p.10159365154450398&type=3&permPage=1
